mkc.description: Creates a new class. Usage: mkc <class_name>

af.description: Adds a Field to a class. Usage: aa <class_name> <field>

am.description: Adds a method to a class with optional overloading. Usage: am <class_name> <method_name> <parameter>

ar.description: Adds or updates a relationship in a class. Usage: ar <class_name> <relationship_type(1-4)>

raf.description: Removes an Field from a class. Usage: raa <class_name> <field>

rmm.description: Removes a method from a class. Usage: rmm <class_name> <method_name> <parameter>

lsa.description: Lists all classes with their fields and methods. Usage: lsa

lsc.description: Lists only the class names. Usage: lsc

lsr.description: Lists classes that have relationships. Usage: lsr

save.description: Saves the current progress to a file. Usage: save <filename>

load.description: Loads the saved progress from a file. Usage: load <filename>

clear.description: Clears all the current progress. Usage: clear

rf.description: Renames a field in a class. Usage: ra <class_name> <old_field> <new_field>

rmn.description: Renames a method in a class. Usage: rmn <class_name> <old_method_name> <new_method_name> <parameter>

ap.description: Adds a parameter to a class. Usage: ap <class_name> <method_name> <parameter> <new_parameter_name> <new_parameter_type>
